summary: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.
cast: Aamir Khan|Saif Ali Khan|Akshaye Khanna|Preity Zinta|Sonali Kulkarni|Dimple Kapadia|Ayub Khan|Rajat Kapoor|Suhasini Mulay|Ahmed Khan|Suchitra Pillai|Anjula Bedi|Rakesh Pandey|Samantha Tremayne|Claire|Clarence|Asad Dadarkar|Bomi Doctor|Beatrice Gibson|Kannu Gill|Yusuf Hussain|Rio Kapadia|Simran Makhija|Deepak Malhotra|Shail Mehta|Sarah Neilson|Shaina|Shilpa|Anand Subaya|Mandala Tayde|Meenakshi Verma|Gordon Waddell|Kerry Casey|Kiran Rao
title: Dil Chahta Hai
